title: 41 and 42 of the Mother and Baby Institutions Payment Scheme Act 2023 (No.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Mother and Baby Institutions Payment
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Mother and Baby Institutions Payment 

Scheme Act 2023 (Commencement) (No. 2) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited mother baby institution payment scheme act 2023 (commencement) (no 2) order 2024

title: 41 and 42 of the Mother and Baby Institutions Payment Scheme Act 2023 (No.
heading: 2. The 30th day of April 2024 is appointed as the day on which sections
text_raw:
2. The 30th day of April 2024 is appointed as the day on which sections 
41 and 42 of the Mother and Baby Institutions Payment Scheme Act 2023 (No. 
20 of 2023) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 April, 2024. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 3rd May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [189] 3
